  physical_appearance: \The image displays a plaque which has a brown border. A drawing of the front of the former Singapore National Theatre can be seen at the centre of the plaque. The year \u00271963\u0027 and \u0027Singapore\u0027 are displayed below the drawing. Within the border of the larger and small circle
 the words
 \\South East Asia Cultural Festival\\ is written between their circumferences. Below the two circular boundaries

  subject_terms_1: there is a rectangle containing words in red capital letters inside. It states that the plaque is \u0027presented to Feng Huang Motion Picture Co...\u0027 Some of the colours on the words and images of the plaque have faded away. \ commemoratives gift giving festivals honours

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image displays a plaque which has a brown border. A drawing of the front of the former Singapore National Theatre can be seen at the centre of the plaque. The year '1963' and 'Singapore' are displayed below the drawing. Within the border of the larger and small circle, the words, ""South East Asia Cultural Festival"" is written between their circumferences. Below the two circular boundaries
